hycu_onboarding_guide1_description: Explore our guides and detailed documentation to help you with your project.
hycu_onboarding_guide2_description: Discover our scalable, hyperconverged platform (HCI), ready to use in just a few hours Available as a pack or as a BYOL (Bring Your Own License) solution, it combines Nutanix Cloud Platform (NCP) software licenses with dedicated, Nutanix-qualified OVHcloud Hosted Private Cloud infrastructure.
hycu_onboarding_guide3_description: Rely on the HYCU for OVHcloud service for a controlled, high-performance disaster recovery, with a controlled cost, and no surprises.
